name: Welcome to the Dungeon
description:
◆Welcome to the extreme dungeon! Be diabolical!◆


Dear Master,


O Master! Demons have abandoned this land for too long!
Turn the Demon's Spin so darkness can return to the Land of Light.
Call forth and strengthen monsters with gold and gems from the bodies of knights!
Watch the annoying knights bleed to their deaths!


Let me show you how you play.
Turn the Demon's Spin to bring knights into the dungeon.
Position the monsters in the dungeon to play against the warriors.
Your infamy will rise only if the monsters win.
The higher your infamy, the stronger warriors they send.
Use the money from your battles to buy more monsters or strengthen them. Ooh~ so simple, no?

Watch out for the details!
Over 100 retro monsters await your call.
16 dungeons on 4 lands await their master.
The game also features retro-themed music by O'Lee. Oh the nostalgia!


Watch the epic resurrection story of the demons. They may begin with a bad pun or two, but end in all seriousness!
The infinite war between light and dark! Only you, Master, can end it!


P. S.
The world battles over the title of Ruler of All Magic.
Be the first to register your name on the leader board and rise in infamy!
I'll tell you the rest in the opening of the game!


Yours truly, Eyeball
